mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Extended & Mainstream Handbook", "Basics List", "The Block Concept", "New Dancers", "New England Town Meeting", and "National Square Dance Convention". This edition also includes the regular features entitled "Hot Line-Late News", "As I See It", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "Contra Corner", "Ladies on the Square", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Callers/Teachers Workshop", "The Callers' Text", "Caller of the Month", "On the Record", "Square Dance Date Book", and "Fashion Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
